entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 6:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -17.7°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
